scripts.postinstall: pnpm run cli:gen-essentials && pnpm run build:toolchain
scripts.cli:gen-essentials: pnpm run --filter @ossinsight/cli build && pnpm run --filter @ossinsight/cli start widgets gen-types && pnpm run --filter @ossinsight/cli start widgets gen-modules && pnpm run --filter @ossinsight/cli start endpoints gen-modules
